RUNNER_VERSION=5.0.3
DATA_DIR=forgejo-runner-data

mkdir forgejo-runner-data
docker run --rm code.forgejo.org/forgejo/runner:$RUNNER_VERSION \
    forgejo-runner generate-config > $DATA_DIR/config.yaml

docker run --rm -it -v $PWD/$DATA_DIR:/data code.forgejo.org/forgejo/runner:$RUNNER_VERSION \
    forgejo-runner register
